meanings.definition: In a harsh or unpleasant manner
meanings.sent1: The alarm clock rang gratingly, waking me up abruptly.
meanings.sent2: Her voice sounded gratingly loud in the quiet library.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed gratingly as if demanding a royal feast.
meanings.sent4: The car brakes screeched gratingly, startling the pedestrians.
meanings.sent5: The metal grate scraped gratingly against the concrete floor.

meanings.sent1: The gratingly loud music from the party next door kept me awake.
meanings.sent2: His gratingly sarcastic remarks made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The gratingly slow service at the restaurant tested our patience.
meanings.sent4: Her gratingly persistent questions annoyed the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The gratingly repetitive sound of the dripping faucet drove me crazy.
